## Security Checklist

- [ ] No hardcoded API keys, tokens, or secrets
- [ ] No private infrastructure URLs (use env vars)
- [ ] No PII or user data in code/comments
- [ ] SQL queries use parameterized inputs (no string interpolation)
- [ ] New endpoints validate input properly

## Testing

- [ ] Tested locally with `docker compose up`
- [ ] Tested against a live PostgreSQL + pgvector instance
- [ ] Search results are accurate and ranked correctly
